organisation_name: Federation of Regional Growth Actors in Europe (FEDRA)

goals__remit: FEDRA is a regional affairs expertise hub whose objective is to inform and engage its members and partners in regional policies, projects and networks. To ensure such a level of expertise, we provide our members with the advice of a “Pool of Regional Experts” composed of senior professionals and the skills of our “Advisory Board” coming from the private, public and academic world. With its unique database of 20,000 key regional influencers in more than 300 European regions, FEDRA is able to design projects for its partners, and stimulate bonds between them to create regional growth ecosystems.
